1197250.name: Spellinkers OST (2019)

Spellinkers Game OST (2019)
Tracklist:
01 Enter Spellinkers! (Title Screen)
02 Victory Fanfare
03 Pocket Full of Stars
04 Crystal Ball (Merlin's Tower)
05 Traveling (Ivory Garden)
06 Traveling (Obsidian Quag)
07 Traveling (Hellstone Plains)
08 Traveling (Gold Dust Dunes)
09 Ivory Garden
10 Obsidian Quag
11 Hellstone Plains
12 Gold Dust Dunes
13 Midas, the Alchemist
14 Mist of Madness (Bonus Stage)
15 Colossal Pyramid (Final Boss Stage)
16 Triumph!
17 Returning Home (Ending)
18 Ask me Anything (Tutorial)
19 Corrupted Mage (Game Over)
20 Dawn Over the Ivory Tower (Discarded Track)
